text: Kerrin Sheldon is an American filmmaker, best known for his documentary, Heroin(e) for which he received Academy Award for Best Documentary Short Subject nomination with wife Elaine McMillion Sheldon at the 90th Academy Awards. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:American producers Category:American directors Category:American cinematographers Category:Peabody Award winners Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Kerrin Sheldon
